title: PESSAT
content:
I Want to get into PES very badly and I missed the pessat cut off by 200 ranks..so I've spoken with my parents and decided to take a drop for PESSAT (wish me luck)..so I'm writing this to ask for books and websites I can refer to and prepare well for the exam..I will focus on my English too so I don't lack there, please help me with any kinds of material..Thank you in advance.














































/s

comments.body:
Bruh

This is a joke right? Please don't tell me you're being serious lmfao
I hope this is a shitpost
I guess so. There's an "/s" in the end now, OP probably edited it

>I Want to get into PES very badly

as far as entrance exam is concerned... Personally felt embibe was the best source... I gave mock tests, practised pyq's and even watched lectures thr...
